TopicTitle: Loss of Control when switching to map mode

Articles.Content: Every time I enter map mode while under power for any trajectory my craft looses control. As soon as I go back to craft view it corrects itself. Hard to do proper burns when this happens.

I see the same issue. Both in orbit and landed.

When I have a Munar Module landed on the Mun and a Command Module in Munar Orbit, the lander goes unstable. When I control the CM, then switch back the the landed Munar Module, its no longer standing still. It bounces around, or even has rolled. Even though it was stationary when I last controlled it.
